name: AIA_GetInstanceStatusAttributes
description: Expression Rule to get Extraction Instance Status Attributes
sail_code:
/*Initiated - "hourglass-start" (orange3)
Extracted/Classified/Passed Validations - "clipboard-check" (blue3)
Reconciled - "check-double" (green3)
Needs Review/Failed Validations - "tasks-alt" (yellow3)
Automated - "check-square-o" (purple3)*/
a!match(
  value: ri!value,
  equals: cons!AIA_REF_INSTANCE_STATUSES[1],
  then: a!map(
    icon: "hourglass-start",
    label: cons!AIA_REF_INSTANCE_STATUSES[1],
    color: tostring(ri!brandingMap.Orange3)
  ),
  equals: cons!AIA_INSTANCE_STATUS_PROCESSED,
  then: a!map(
    icon: "clipboard-alt",
    label: cons!AIA_INSTANCE_STATUS_PROCESSED,
    color: tostring(ri!brandingMap.Blue3)
  ),
  equals: cons!AIA_REF_INSTANCE_STATUSES[6],
  then: a!map(
    icon: "clipboard-alt",
    label: cons!AIA_REF_INSTANCE_STATUSES[6],
    color: tostring(ri!brandingMap.Blue3)
  ),
  equals: cons!AIA_REF_INSTANCE_STATUSES[7],
  then: a!map(
    icon: "clipboard-alt",
    label: cons!AIA_REF_INSTANCE_STATUSES[7],
    color: tostring(ri!brandingMap.Blue3)
  ),
  equals: cons!AIA_REF_INSTANCE_STATUSES[3],
  then: a!map(
    icon: "check-circle",
    label: cons!AIA_REF_INSTANCE_STATUSES[3],
    color: tostring(ri!brandingMap.Green3)
  ),
  equals: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:d08a4c0c-cc11-4ec9-b069-3cecc075c7b0",
  then: a!map(
    icon: "user-check",
    label: cons!AIA_REF_INSTANCE_STATUSES[3],
    color: tostring(ri!brandingMap.Green3)
  ),
  equals: cons!AIA_REF_INSTANCE_STATUSES[4],
  then: a!map(
    icon: "clipboard-list",
    label: cons!AIA_REF_INSTANCE_STATUSES[4],
    color: tostring(ri!brandingMap.Red3)
  ),
  equals: "Marked for Review",
  then: a!map(
    icon: "clipboard-list",
    label: cons!AIA_REF_INSTANCE_STATUSES[4],
    color: tostring(ri!brandingMap.Red3)
  ),
  equals: cons!AIA_REF_INSTANCE_STATUSES[5],
  then: a!map(
    icon: "flask",
    label: cons!AIA_REF_INSTANCE_STATUSES[5],
    color: tostring(ri!brandingMap.Blue3)
  ),
  equals: "Automated",
  then: a!map(
    icon: "flask",
    label: cons!AIA_REF_INSTANCE_STATUSES[5],
    color: tostring(ri!brandingMap.Blue3)
  ),
  equals: cons!AIA_REF_INSTANCE_STATUSES[8],
  then: a!map(
    icon: "clipboard-check",
    label: cons!AIA_REF_INSTANCE_STATUSES[8],
    color: tostring(ri!brandingMap.Blue3)
  ),
  default: null()
)
